turkish_example_sentence: Siz kısa sürede bu zor kimya konusunun tüm prensiplerini bileceksiniz.
english_example_sentence: You will know all the principles of this difficult chemistry topic in a short time.
russian_example_sentence: Вы будете знать все принципы этой сложной темы химии в короткое время.
